snippet: The Truth Commission in São Paulo said that Juscelino Kubitschek, the country’s president from 1956 to 1961, was murdered in a conspiracy by the military dictatorship ruling Brazil at the time.
abstract: Truth Commission in Sao Paulo concludes that Juscelino Kubitschek, Brazil’s president from 1956 to 1961, was murdered in 1976 in conspiracy by the military dictatorship ruling Brazil at the time; commission is one of various such entities in Brazil examining abuses during military rule.
lead_paragraph: The Truth Commission in São Paulo said that Juscelino Kubitschek, the country’s president from 1956 to 1961, was murdered in a conspiracy by the military dictatorship ruling Brazil at the time.

headline.main: Brazilian Panel Says Ex-Leader Was Murdered
headline.print_headline: Brazilian Panel Says Ex-Leader Was Murdered
